Tortoise female: Guys, are you undismayed by this alive object?

Marine star: This? This is a very interesting new inhabitant. I agree.

Catfish male: It is very conspicuous. I presume this is somebody who was brought here as a result of fallacy.

Tortoise female: Maybe it was not a fallacy. It might be this creature was tamed by our host.

Marine star: I have never seen any marine inhabitants like this. It looks so unusual! I think we can talk with it.

Catfish male: Do you think it is not dangerous?

Marine star: I believe our proprietress is good regarding us and she cares about our security.

Tortoise female: I hope it is true. Lets get acquainted with this inhabitant. Lets say to it Welcome to our congregation!

Catfish male: I feel a flutter in water. I understand it is from her interesting drift-woods.

Tortoise female: It is her way for swiming.

Catfish male: I understand, but it is so far.

Marine star: Hello, wonderful babe! I see you are a new inhabitant in our marine environment. Can we get acquainted and tell about each-other?

Beatrix: Hi, guys. Yes, I am an apprentice in this tank. Indeed, we will talk to each-other about ourself. We can do it right now.

Marine star: I am a marine star. These are a tortoise and catfish. We are from an ocean. We were brought here by fishmen a long time ago.

Beatrix: I am from an ocean, too. But to be more correct I am from a swamp. After living in the swamp I lived in the ocean and after that I was gotten to a river from where I was brought here by fishmen, too.

Crab: Can you demand her to swim to me after you will get acquainted with her?

Beatrix: Who is this?

Tortoise female: This is our matey Crab. He can not move aloft like we and he demands you to move down to him. He only creeps on the bottom. So he will can look at you. Lets swim down.

Crab: Nice to meet you. Lets get acquainted. What is your name? What kind of marine inhabitants are you?

Beatrix: My name is Beatrix and I am a hybrid being. What is your name?

Crab: I am a crab. That's all about how you have to call me. You are so unusual marine animal! Now I am seeing such animal the first time in my life! Lets talk about you.

Beatrix: I am an exemplar of a hybrid specie. I combine some evidences of other live species such as people, insects, fishes and, besides, I have some individual features the representatives of all these species do not possess. I am going to tell you in detail about my similarities and difference with all of these species.

Crab: My curiosity is amplifying in every moment!

Beatrix: My similarities with people refer to body. My body is like a human body. My tail is artificial, not natural. It is stitched of tissues. I have legs like human legs which my tail is on. But there are some difference from the bodies point of view. I have double respiratory system. So I have aptitudes to breathe with water not only air and live in water space dislike people. In the same time I can communicat with people through their language. There is difference between me and people regarding lifestyle and sustentation. It is naturally that my life is in water. I have some similarities with insects. I have wigs like wigs of a butterfly. I can fly through these wigs. Also the wigs serve me as drift-woods of a marine inhabitant. I swim through them in water. As I have already said I lived in the swamp in the ocean after that and in the river the at last time. I mined feed for myself. I had a good friend frog in the swamp. Unfortunately the circumstances like these hinder our communication now. I don't know if we would can meet again whenever.

Catfish male: We compassionate you. We understand it is lamentable.

Beatrix: Thank you.

We were fond catching mosquitos and funny games in the swamp. It was my indispensable friend in the swamp. I wanted to see the world so much that I decided to relinquish our friendship not knowing how long would be the peroid during which we would not see each-other.

Marine star: We want your state of mind to be ameliorated in your new life with us.

Crab: Now you pertain to our host like all of us. Care about all of us is her deal.

Marine star: You said, you can communicate with our host?

Beatrix: Yes.

Marine star: It is interesting. We can not do this.

Catfish male: Because you have told us about yourself now we can tell you about us if you want. Do you want us to tell you about ourselves?

Beatrix: Of course. Why not?

Catfish male: Then I am begining the narrative. I am a catfish as you see. This is a tortoise, this is a marine star and this is a crab. I think you saw animals like us in the ocean. There are some other animals like us in this aquarium. You will see them later. We did not know each other until we were coalesced into one company in this aquarium. We were abdicated from the ocean not according to our own will. Were you gotten here according your own will?

Beatrix: I abdicated from the swamp to see the world from other sides. I had such desire to see what is here. And right now I can posit something regarding this place and other places where I lived earlier. The ocean is so immence compared with the space of this tank.

Marine star: I think the space of this aquarium is enough far-flung. The depth particulary is large and I like it.

Tortoise female: But the space is not such far-flung for Crab as it is for us. I think how large is depth is not so matter for him. Unfortunately he does not swim. He always is only on the bottom.

Catfish male: It is an usual indoor aquarium which belongs the humans. Indeed, it can not be of such size as reservoirs in nature.

Crab: I don't like shallow water spaces despite I am in the bottom everytime. I like sleek places of the bottom more than places covered with stones. Beatrix, can you solicit our host to leave more places uncovered when she change water next time?

Beatrix: I can, of course.

Crab: Wonderful! Thank you. It is your tangible advantage that you can speak to people. Besides I like when dirty water is deflated from here and there is new clean water.

Tortoise female: Our host deflates us into other water vessels when she drains water from the aquarium and fulls it with clear water.

Beatrix: Despite this place is such little it is so wonderful here! There was altogether otherwise view in the all spaces where I lived earlier!

Crab: I see you like this castle.

Beatrix: There were nothing like this in other places where I lived earlier. It is curious who has devices all of this.

Crab: There is another catfish who is sleeping now behind it. There are also some other animals in our aquarium who is in the castle now. I would like all of us to attend in our general allotment in this castle sometimes and you to tell about yourself more. Your appearance in our congregation is a grander event. But we have to postpone our general meeting because some animals are not ready to it at the moment.

Beatrix: I remember my host conjured me to stay away from the surface of our water space because otherwise it may be dangerous. The danger is in her dog who can afford to make us its booty. She daunted me with her dog. It seems her dog is merciless. I think it is a predatory animal.

Tortoise female: Yes, I am agree with you. But I am sure just complience her instructions means we have no reasons to be anxious about our lives. The dog has no possibilities to perpetuate into our space.

Beatrix: She conjured me to do as she said. I understand her, but she has covered the surface with something. Is it not too much? To be frankly I would have inclination to walk out of this aquarium because there is much interesting things outside. I would be careful about my security.

Tortoise female: We compassionate you, but we can help with nothing to you. You can discuss this problem with the host if you have not discussed it yet to the enough extent.

Marine star: I think the fact that surface is covered is instructive for you. It is covered not intentionally. How can you know you are always in safety when you are out of the tank?

Crab: I presume there is necessarity of hurdles for the dog to reach the surface of out space with its tongue. Maybe our host is anxious about us.

Beatrix: But I am sure I have enough discretion not to get into irreparable trouble.

Crab: I would like all of us including the animals who have not seen you yet to attend in our general meeting with you in the castle. It will be a nice venue. You may not be coy in surrounding of them. Do not be daunted if it seems to you as they are a bit in obscurity looking at you. It will be because they have not accustomed to see and communicate with animals like you. But at least they understand that there is overabundance of different marine animal species and probabilities to meet somebody unusual of them. I know nobody of them will retreat from you soon.

Marine star: Hi, Catfish. How did you sleep?
This is our new cohabitant Beatrix. She is an unusual being as you see.

Catfish female: We will be acquainted. It is fine that there is an unusual apprentice in our little world.

Crab: Well, lets go to our castle and organize our meeting with everybody of us. Call other inhabitants.

Author's words: There all of the inhabitants are on their general meeting in the castle.

Marine star: I am glad that all of us are here including Beatrix. I think you all are glad, too. Lets plop her.

Tortoise male: Nice. Lets inquiry Beatrix to tell us about herself everybody of us to hear.

Beatrix: Well, I am glad you are interested. I will try. I am a hybrid being. There are some evidences of other live species such as human, insect and also I have evidence of a marine animal, of course. People call me a mermaid, but I am not a mermaid in reality. Mermaid is a girl whose top half of body is human and bottom half is fish. My body is human altogether exept something inside. But there is something that differs me from people. It is my double respiratory system. It allows me breath water and air. In the same time people have otherwise respiratory system and can not breath water. I can communicate with people, understand them and tell my thoughts in words. I have wigs like wigs of a butterfly. I can fly through my wigs like a butterfly. Also they serve me as drift-woods.

Tortoise female: It is interesting. I saw a creature like you at once when I lived in an ocean. Yes, you are akin a human.

Catfish female: Can you tell us how have you appeared in this aquarium?

Beatrix: I lived in a swamp. After that I decided to live in an ocean because I wanted to see the world. I knew there is something exept the swamp in the world. I flew from the swamp to the ocean. I communicated with different marine animals in the ocean. I saw animals like you. The ocean was a venue of interesting acquaintances. I am glad I was there. The animals told me about themself very much. The topic which I like very much is marine nature.

Catfish female: How did you get into our aquarium?

Beatrix: I lived in a river after living in the ocean. At once a fisherman caught me. He understood that I am an unusual marine and humanoid in the same time creature and he knew our host. He knew she had an aquarium and would not rebuff from such pet as me. He brought me to her gate and I flew to her and get acquainted with her. Since that moment I have been living here.

Catfish female: We hope you like to live here.

Crab: She is a bit lamentable about her friendship with a frog which has ceased. The frog lives in the swamp. She and Beatrix had friendship when Beatrix lived in the swamp.

Beatrix: I hope someday I would can attend in the swamp again and resume my relationship with Darma. I'll ask somebody of people who are acquainted with me to bring me to the swamp. I will try to see my friend.

Tortoise female: I wish your desire to be realized.

Catfish male: Was Darma warned that it was possible that she would never see you again?

Beatrix: She hopes someday we would see each-other again. She perceives there is such probability we would never see each-other again, but she wants us to meet someday again.
No, she can't.

Tortoise female: Do you have any ideas when you can see her again?

Beatrix: No, I don't. I must talk to Helen in the begining. Helen is our host. I can discuss the trip to the swamp with her. Maybe she or the fishman who found me can bring me to the swamp.

Catfish female: Maybe not. It depends of how host refers to frogs.

Tortoise female: Did you have any friends except Darma in the swamp?

Beatrix: Yes, I did. But Darma was my special friend. She always understood and supported me. Also I refered to her.

Tortoise female: Was there somebody whom you liked in the ocean?

Beatrix: There were a lot of different animals in the ocean. There were more animals than in the swamp. It was joyously, but it is not enough without Darma.

Tortoise male: Only you can glide how to meet Darma again and communicate with her because you have possibility to talk to people who can help you to reach the swamp where you lived.

Catfish female: I hope, you like us. Tell us, please. Do you like in this water space?

Beatrix: Frankly, it is a bit close. There was so much space and different animals in the ocean! In the same time there are only a few ones of us and not so much of space here.

Catfish female: I understand you. Here we are in the confined space, but it is so wonderful view! Pay your attention at them! What else I can hint at - you can discuss your decision about your inhabitant with our host. We can not. We were mustered into this aquarium independently from our own will.

Tortoise female: Do you wish to return to the ocean or the swamp?

Beatrix: I will think about it. Somehow I would like to meet Darma again and tell her anything what I have known about the ocean, the river and this aquarium.
